Summary: It was just an orb, and when we zoomed in on our camera it was changing colors frequently
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at the computer and my dad called me outside to see what he was looking at. It looked like a star, but it was just hovering in a straight path the the left of us and making no noise. Well aliens of course, I got excited at the fact that I get to witness such a thing, I've seen things like this before but. This was the first time we got it on tape. The motions and detail, well..like I said, just a straight path to the left and we couldn't make out any detail with the zoom on his phone. We just saw the colors. Vibrant and..indescribable. My feelings were...well you can kinda tell on the tape, I was happy and in disbelief, I thought it was just amazing! We lost the sight when it just flew into the darkness of the sky. Itt was moving pretty fast. On the film there is a tweet noise, just excuse it its my dads text alert sound.
